title: DENIM JACQUARD JACKET
desc: Cotton denim jacket with floral jacquard motif all over. This model is enhanced by buttons with a raised Pegaso logo.• Boxy fit• Lapel collar• Fastened with Pegaso buttons• Patch pockets with faux flap at the sides• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
